game.name: Whisper of the House
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Whisper of the House is a cozy game about organizing and decorating. You'll take on various tasks from the townspeople—helping them move, organize, and clean their spaces. In the process, your gentle touch might make a difference in their lives, and perhaps uncover some hidden stories...
game.shortDescriptionEn: Whisper of the House is a cozy game about organizing and decorating. You'll take on various tasks from the townspeople—helping them move, organize, and clean their spaces. In the process, your gentle touch might make a difference in their lives, and perhaps uncover some hidden stories...

reviewHighlights.text: 한국어 제발... 내주세요.... ㅜㅜㅜㅜ 재밌는데 한국어가 안돼요 ㅜㅜ
상호작용 찾는 재미가 있습니다. 마법사의 집을 청소할 때는 레시피 북에 나온 대로 물약을 만들 수도 있어요. 스타듀밸리나 동숲에서 집 꾸미는 거 좋아하셨던 분들, 언패킹 재밌게 하셨던 분들께 추천합니다!
